Class StatBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • StatBar
  • public class StatBar
extends greenfoot.Actor
    StatBar is the stat bar that displays the time, day, current funds, food supply, number of customers, and pests.
    Version:
    1 (28/04/2020)
    Author:
    Evan Ng

        day - Current day
        currentFunds - Current funds of restaurant
        foodSupply - Current food supply in percentage
        numberOfCustomers - Current number of customers in restaurant
        rating - Current rating of restaurant
